title: Opinion: Shared decision-making on vaccines is not the enemy
description: “In its urge to say what Kennedy gets wrong, the public health and medical community is actively resisting something he gets right.”
content: “In its urge to say what Kennedy gets wrong, the public health and medical community is actively resisting something he gets right.”
